text: Joseph Fidler "Joe" Walsh (born Joseph Fidler; November 20, 1947) is an American musician, singer-songwriter, multi-instrumentalist, record producer, and actor. He was previously a member of The James Gang, Barnstorm and the Eagles.Pete Prown; Harvey P. Newquist, Legends of Rock Guitar: The Essential Reference of Rock's Greatest Guitarists (Milwaukee, WI: Leonard, 1997), p. 110 ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:American rock guitarists Category:American rock singers Category:American singer- songwriters Category:Singers from Wichita, Kansas Category:Writers from Wichita, Kansas Category:Musicians from Wichita, Kansas Category:Warner Bros. Records artists
title: Joe Walsh
